name: Redraw
description:
Redraw is a puzzle-platformer game consisting of different obstacles. You play as a time-traveling, shape-shifting alien who needs to find his crown! Each level combines various puzzles where you'll need to rewind time to get some help from your past selves!

Controls:

A - move left, D - move right, W or Space - jump, Ctrl - Rewind time, 1, 2, 3 - morph into different objects, P - pause
